Text:

Phew! Just in time for DrWho finale. Thx 20-40 :)
Nice compact download, great quality for PC viewing.  Thanks twentyforty.

Thanks for all your high quality torrents.  I choose your uploads exclusively for all the TV shows I watch.  Nice work twentyforty.

Could Doctor.Who.2005.S05E05 be reseeded please?  There are a few of us trying to download it without success.
Also I have looked and never found Doctor.Who.2005.S05E08 from you.  Is that available anywhere?

Thanks again for all your work.  This takes a lot of time and dedication.  It is appreciated.
